info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Stephens, east central Habersham, south central Rabun and southwestern Oconee Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Toccoa, or near Tallulah Gorge State Park, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walhalla, Westminster, Tallulah Falls, Tallulah Gorge State Park, Long Creek and Turnerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
